attributes.action: Stop Companies Making Huge Profits & Paying Fat Cat Salaries at the Expense of the Consumer
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living is soaring, families are suffering as a result - struggling and worrying who to pay then next bill yet alone trying to relax, buy clothes, food etc.  Prices continuously keep rising at a higher rate than that of people's wages!  The companies shouldn't be allowed to keep paying these huge fat cat salaries to people and creating such huge profits.  All of this is at the expense to the consumer! So sign this to push these companies to reduce their profits that pay these wages so that prices don't continuously have to rise.
